rooms.description: Contemporary open-plan living area combined with kitchen, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows to allow natural light and ventilation. This space adheres to Vastu principles by being oriented towards the east for positive energy.
Primary bedroom with ample natural light and privacy; located on the north side to align with Vastu principles.
Well-equipped bathroom adjacent to the bedroom, ensuring privacy and convenience while maintaining Vastu compatibility with water element placement.
Compact storage area for kitchen essentials and other utilities; designed to be efficient without compromising on aesthetics.
Open central courtyard that provides ventilation and natural light throughout the townhouse. The courtyard is integrated into the design to promote an airy living space.

openings.description: Large windows that span the full height of the walls to maximize natural light and provide a sense of openness, in line with contemporary design principles.
Seamless transition from indoor living space to the courtyard; enhances connectivity and ventilation.
